thread.title: BRIEF-Cleantech Solutions International Enters Into Exclusivity Agreement With Channel Power For Potential Acquisition Of Touch Media

title: BRIEF-Cleantech Solutions International Enters Into Exclusivity Agreement With Channel Power For Potential Acquisition Of Touch Media

organizations.name: brief-cleantech solutions international enters into exclusivity agre
channel power for potential acquisition of touch media reuters

text:
Jan 4 (Reuters) - Cleantech Solutions International Inc :
* CLEANTECH SOLUTIONS INTERNATIONAL ENTERS INTO EXCLUSIVITY AGREEMENT WITH CHANNEL POWER FOR POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF TOUCH MEDIA
* CLEANTECH SOLUTIONS - CO‘S UNIT ‍EC ADVERTISING LIMITED ENTERED DEAL FOR POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF NOT LESS THAN 73 PERCENT OF CHANNEL POWER
* CLEANTECH SOLUTIONS INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍EC ADVERTISING WILL IN EFFECT OWN 51% OF TOTAL VOTING RIGHTS OF TOUCH MEDIA​
* CLEANTECH SOLUTIONS INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍EC ADVERTISING WILL IN EFFECT OWN 51 PERCENT OF TOTAL VOTING RIGHTS OF TOUCH MEDIA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
